description: Helpers library for Feelance Market app

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && tsc --outDir build/src && node scripts/build-package.js && cp -r build/cjs/*.js build/src/ && cp -r build/esm/*.js build/src/
scripts.build:cjs: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --presets=./scripts/babel-preset.js --extensions .ts,.tsx --ignore src/**/*.specs.tsx --out-dir build/cjs --source-maps
scripts.build:esm: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --presets=./scripts/babel-preset.js --extensions .ts,.tsx --ignore src/**/*.specs.tsx --out-dir build/esm --source-maps

name: @chanakaHetti/freelance-market-shared
author: Chanaka HA
